node.title: NixOS Configuration Notes
node.description: Tips and tricks for configuring NixOS, a declarative, immutable Linux distribution.

node.title: Using ZSH with Toolbox on Fedora Silverblue 33
node.description: Setup your own customized shell within Fedora Toolbox, all while maintaining convenience features from the default shell.
